PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaterialMechanical
PropertySetDef.Definition: A set of mechanical material properties normally used for structural analysis purpose. It contains all properties which are independent of the actual material type.

PropertyDef.Name: DynamicViscosity
PropertyDef.Definition: A measure of the viscous resistance of the material.

PropertyDef.Name: YoungModulus
PropertyDef.Definition: A measure of the Young's modulus of elasticity of the material.

PropertyDef.Name: ShearModulus
PropertyDef.Definition: A measure of the shear modulus of elasticity of the material.

PropertyDef.Name: PoissonRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: A measure of the lateral deformations in the elastic range.

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalExpansionCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: A measure of the expansion coefficient for warming up the material about one Kelvin.
